Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide WBp-1 from wheat bran: Purification, characterization and antibacterial potential against Listeria monocytogenes
Literature.Author: Zou Z, Purnawan MA, Wang Y, Ismail BB, Zhang X, Yang Z, Guo M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:3% Hemolysis=1200 µg/ml,Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):18% Cytotoxicity=1200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=300µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=500µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=500µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=>600µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=500µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=150µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MBC=400µg/ml)
